name: Advanced Custom Fields: Position Field
author: Mikhail Kobzarev

sections.description:
• Author: mihdan
  • Project URI: http://kobzarev.com
  • License: GPL 2. See License below for copyright jots and tittles.

Addon for Advanced Custom Fields that adds a position field (country/region/city) to the available field types

License

sections.installation:
To use plugin, you will need:

  • an installed and configured copy of WordPress version 2.6.x, 2.5.x,
    2.3.x, 2.2.x, 2.1.x, 2.0.x, or 1.5.x. (Advanced Custom Fields: Position Field will also work with
    the equivalent versions of WordPress MU.)

  • FTP or SFTP access to your web host

New Installations

  1. Download the Advanced Custom Fields: Position Field archive in zip or gzipped tar format and
    extract the files on your computer.

  2. Create a new directory named acf-position in the wp-content/plugins
    directory of your WordPress installation. Use an FTP or SFTP client to
    upload the contents of your Advanced Custom Fields: Position Field archive to the new directory
    that you just created on your web host.

  3. Import dump from sql directory into MySQL database

  4. Log in to the WordPress Dashboard and activate the Advanced Custom Fields: Position Field plugin.

  5. Configure the plugin and add it to the plugin settings page.
